silex_client.utils.config module¶

class silex_client.utils.config.Config(config_search_path: Optional[Union[list, str]] = None)¶

Bases: object

Utility class that lazy load and resolve the configurations on demand

Variables

config_search_path – List of path to look for config files. The order matters.

resolve_action(action_name: str, **kwargs: dict) → Any¶

Resolve a config file from its name by looking in the stored root path
